outputs.output_descr: The intended impact of the project is "resiliency of communities who are able to mitigate, prepare, respond, recover and adapt from crisis in a manner that reduces vulnerability to climate change and different types of disasters". UNDP in cooperation with the Government of the Philippines will contribute to building resiliency by supporting capacity development, strengthening linkages and harmonization of policy and implementation frameworks and promoting timely and knowledge based decisions and actions. This project will address urgent preparedness and crisis management issues as well as long term and strategic integration of disaster risk reduction, climate change adaptation and development management within the transformative framework of resiliency.
